bcf2vcf and vcf2bcf
--------------------

test_vcf2bcf_v1.vcf  origin unknown

json2yaml and yaml2json
-------------------------

- test files: test_v1.json and test_v1.yaml 
- description: simple dictionary-like data sets with comments in the YAML file
